Hi

I have a problem with one of my experiments the others I have done
have worked fine. The problem is that after some hours (1-3) the
program goes down with a segmentation fault. I have included the
information I could get with gdb and the code that fails. It looks
like a problem in the central neat code. Does anybody know what is wrong?

Mikkel Baun Kjaergaard

>>>>>
Reproducing

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0806cdd4 in Link::derive_trait(Trait*) (this=0x897f618,
curtrait=0xa) at neat/networks.cpp:300
300           params[count]=(curtrait->params)[count];
(gdb) bt
#0  0x0806cdd4 in Link::derive_trait(Trait*) (this=0x897f618,
curtrait=0xa) at neat/networks.cpp:300
#1  0x080717fc in Genome::genesis(int) (this=0x897bd20, id=0) at
neat/genetics.cpp:334
#2  0x0808201d in Organism (this=0x924cb58, fit=0, g=0x897bd20,
gen=299) at genetics.h:718
#3  0x0807e060 in Species::reproduce(int, Population*,
std::list<Species*, std::allocator<Species*> >&) (this=0x80b6cd8,
generation=299, pop=0x80b5b90, 
    sorted_species=@0xbfffd380) at neat/genetics.cpp:3675
#4  0x0807ccb3 in Population::epoch(int) (this=0x80b5b90,
generation=299) at neat/genetics.cpp:3197
#5  0x080652f5 in CoEvolutionExp::epoch(int, char*) (this=0x80b7058,
generation=299, filename=0x8fdb720 "othello_gen_co/othello_gen_co_299")
    at othello/NeatExperiment.cpp:145
#6  0x0806468a in Experiment::evolve(int, int) (this=0x80b7058,
startgen=290, generations=3000) at othello/NeatExperiment.cpp:34
#7  0x0806452b in performExp(char*, char*, char*, char*)
(arg2=0xbffff65d "1", arg3=0xbffff65f "othello_gen_co",
arg4=0xbffff66e "290", arg5=0xbffff672 "3000")
    at othello/NeatExperiment.cpp:21
#8  0x0808fb9c in main (argc=6, argv=0xbfffd6b4) at
neat/neatmain_ng.cpp:109
#9  0x42015574 in __libc_start_main () from /lib/tls/libc.so.6
<<<<<

Line 300 is


/* ************************************************************** */
/* *                       LINK METHODS HERE                    * */
/* ************************************************************** */
//Reserved for future system expansion
void Link::derive_trait(Trait *curtrait) {
 
  if (curtrait!=0) {
    for (int count=0;count<NEAT::num_trait_params;count++)
>>300>>    params[count]=(curtrait->params)[count];
  }
  else {
    for (int count=0;count<NEAT::num_trait_params;count++)
      params[count]=0;
  }

}
